author: SARA BURNETT
title: For world, Floyd's death was about race. Why not the trials?
description: For people around the world, the killing of George Floyd was about race. A white police officer, with three other officers nearby, kneeled on the neck of a Black man until he stopped breathing, and protests erupted across the country.
